effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Icebound Fortitude for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 12 sec.

Set: Luck of the Draw! has 2 sec increased duration.

While Luck of the Draw! is active, Death Strike costs 10 less Runic Power and can strike up to 2 additional nearby enemies.

spells.description: Use: Gain 4,604 Parry and 3,274 Avoidance for 6 sec, after which you emit a shockwave in front of you that deals 82,024 Physical damage. (30 Sec Cooldown)

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Bloodbane's Gauntlets of Command

spells.description:
Equip: Advance to the 50 Verses of Inner Resilience, reading as you are attacked.
Inner Resilience increases your armor by 3,679 and grants your attacks a chance to invoke a ward which absorbs 1 million Magic damage. When finished, sift through the passages to another chapter.
Use: Sift through the passages in the tome with increased Radiance. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Use: Become Mudborne, absorbing 9.5 million damage and pulsing 468,538 Nature damage split between nearby enemies over 10 sec.

Periodic damage you take coalesces into pungent mud to feed the ritual, reducing this cooldown by 2.0 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 128,227 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

item.name: Sky Darkener's Shroud of the Unholy

name: Best-in-Slots

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to grant you 3,996 to 4,884 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec.
Use: Cheat to immediately gain 4,884 of your highest secondary stat for 15 sec. While out of combat, reconfigure for spell casting instead. (2 Min Cooldown)

description: The wise goblin makes their own luck.

spells.description: Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
